DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : EMD 121974 may stop growth cancer stop blood flow tumor . PURPOSE : Phase I trial study effectiveness EMD 121974 treat patient locally advanced metastatic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: EMD 121974 Treating Patients With Locally Advanced Metastatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine safety tolerability EMD 121974 patient advanced metastatic cancer . II . Correlate various surrogate marker antiangiogenic activity EMD 121974 therapy include magnetic resonance image PET scan , serum assay various angiogenic antiangiogenic factor , serum urine marker calcium metabolism , tumor biopsy . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients receive EMD 121974 IV 1 hour twice weekly 4 week . Treatment continue additional course absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients stable respond disease may continue therapy indefinitely past 2 course disease progression . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos EMD 121974 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 3 2 6 patient experience dose limit toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month first year , every 4 month thereafter disease progression . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 31-40 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically cytologically confirm locally advanced metastatic cancer consider incurable standard curative therapy exist No primary CNS malignancy Measurable evidence residual , recurrent , metastatic disease No prior CNS metastases residual abnormal finding neuroradiologic study Prior CNS metastases allow provide least 6 month definitive therapy normal CT MRI brain PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : ECOG 02 Life expectancy : At least 3 month Hematopoietic : Absolute neutrophil count least 1,500/mm3 Hemoglobin least 9 mg/dL ( may post transfusion ) Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin normal SGOT/SGPT great 2.5 time upper limit normal PT/PTT normal Renal : Creatinine great 1.5 mg/dL Other : Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception No active infection require parenteral antibiotic No document abnormal CNS exam seizure disorder major neuropsychiatric problem PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : At least 2 week since prior hematopoietic growth factor cytokine therapy recover No concurrent immunotherapy Chemotherapy : At least 4 week since prior chemotherapy ( least 6 week since prior nitrosoureas mitomycin ) recover No concurrent chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : No concurrent corticosteroid except steroid replacement therapy chronic low dose ( great 10 mg/day oral prednisone ) therapy nonmalignant condition No concurrent hormonal therapy except oral contraceptive hormonal replacement therapy Radiotherapy : At least 2 week since prior radiotherapy recover No concurrent radiotherapy Surgery : At least 2 week since prior surgery recover Other : At least 4 week since prior investigational drug No concurrent oral parenteral anticoagulant except anticoagulant central venous catheter include low dose warfarin ( 12 mg/day ) and/or heparin No concurrent oral COX2 specific inhibitor ( e.g. , celecoxib rofecoxib )
